email_chain.subject: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I hope this email finds you well. I have a vessel available for a crude oil shipment from Rotterdam to Singapore. The vessel is a 150,000 DWT Aframax with an LOA of 250 meters. The laycan is October 15-20. I can offer a starting freight rate of $52.50 per metric ton. Let me know if this works for you or if you need further details. Best regards, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the quick response. The laycan works for us, but the freight rate seems a bit high. Could you consider lowering it to the low 50s, say $50.75? Also, could you confirm the vessel's specifications and any demurrage terms? Best, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, thanks for your feedback. I can adjust the freight rate to $50.75 per metric ton. The vessel is in excellent condition, and I can provide the full specs upon request. Demurrage is set at $20,000 per day, pro-rata. Let me know if this works for you. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, the adjusted rate looks good. Please send over the full vessel specs and confirm the laycan dates. Also, can we agree on a demurrage rate of $18,000 per day? Looking forward to your response. Best, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I can agree to a demurrage rate of $18,000 per day. The laycan remains October 15-20. I’ll send over the full vessel specs shortly. Let’s finalize the details so we can proceed with the fixture. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, everything looks good on our end. Let’s proceed with the fixture at $50.75 per metric ton and $18,000 per day demurrage. Please send over the contract for review. Thanks, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, great to hear. I’ll prepare the contract and send it over for your review by end of day. Thanks for your cooperation, and looking forward to working together on this shipment. Best regards, Sarah
